ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.2_0: a certain brahmin had invited the nuns for a meal.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.3_0: When the nuns had finished and refused an invitation to eat more, they went to their respective families, where some ate and others got almsfood and left.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.4_0: Soon afterwards that brahmin said to his neighbors,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.5_0: “I have satisfied the nuns. Come, and I’ll satisfy you, too.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.8_0: Those nuns who were invited by you came to our houses, where some ate and others got almsfood and left.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.9_0: He complained and criticized the nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.10_0: “How could they eat in our house and afterwards eat elsewhere? Am I not able to give them as much as they want?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.11_0: The nuns heard the criticism of that brahmin.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.12_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.13_0: “How can nuns finish their meal, refuse an invitation to eat more, and then eat elsewhere?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.14_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.17_0: “... How can nuns act in this way?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.18_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.19_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:1.20.1_0: ‘If a nun, who has been invited to a meal, refuses an invitation to eat more, and then eats staple or non-staple food, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.1.5_0: Refuses an offer to eat more:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.1.6_0: invited to eat any of the five staple foods.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.1.7_0: Refuses an invitation to eat more:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.1.8_0: eating is seen, staple food is seen, it is offered by one standing within arm’s reach, a refusal is seen.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.1.10_0: apart from the five staple foods, rice porridge, the post-midday tonics, the seven-day tonics, and the lifetime tonics,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.1.13_0: there are five kinds of staple food: cooked grain, porridge, flour, fish, and meat.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.1.14_0: he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.1.15_0: For every mouthful, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.2.1_0: If she has refused an offer, and she perceives that she has, and she eats staple or non-staple food, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.2.2_0: If she has refused an offer, but she is unsure of it, and she eats staple or non-staple food, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.2.3_0: If she has refused an offer, but she does not perceive that she has, and she eats staple or non-staple food, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.2.4_0: If she receives post-midday tonics, seven-day tonics, or lifetime tonics for the purpose of food, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.2.5_0: For every mouthful, she commits an offense of wrong conduct. ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.2.7_0: if she has refused an offer to eat more, but not an invitation;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.2.9_0: if she eats more after getting permission from the person who invited her;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.2.10_0: if, when there is a reason, she makes use of post-midday tonics, seven-day tonics, or lifetime tonics;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.2.12_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc54:2.2.13_0: The fourth rule, the training rule on fire, is finished.
